alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 9:29AM CDT until August 27 at 1:16AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. Leaf River At Hattiesburg affecting Forrest County. Chunky River Near Chunky affecting Newton and Lauderdale Counties. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chunky River Near Chunky. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water begins to approach Boyettes Fish Camp. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 20.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 24.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Chunky River Chunky 22.0 20.7 Thu 8 am CDT 22.2 6.8 5.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CDT.
